Package view

Class MinesweeperView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
view.MinesweeperView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Observer
public class MinesweeperView
extends javafx.application.Application
implements java.util.Observer
A view class for the minesweeper game. Holds a model and controller instance as well as methods to setup up the graphical user interface and to update the board when changes are made. Handles multiple events when a player attempts to make a move or when the player interacts with different scenes and buttons.
Author:
Gary Li, Daniel S. Lee, Robert Schnell, Merle Crutchfield

    • createGameBoard

      private javafx.scene.layout.GridPane createGameBoard​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane[][] gameTiles)
      Creates a gridpane that will represent the 13x13 grid for the minesweeper game.
      Parameters:
      gameTiles - A nested array of stackpanes to act as game tiles.
      Returns:

    • createGameTiles

      private javafx.scene.layout.StackPane[][] createGameTiles()
      Creates an 13 by 13 array of stackpanes to represent all tiles within the board. Each stackpane contains rectangles and event handlers to respond to mouse clicks.
      Returns:
      An 13 by 13 nested array of stackpanes.
